name: Rep. Brett Guthrie
tweet_text: Kentuckians’ budgets are taking another hit. Inflation increased 8.5% in just 12 months, which is the most since 1981. Price of gas is the primary driver of the inflation we're facing, which has gone up thanks to President Biden's war on American energy to discourage production.

name: Rep. Brett Guthrie

name: Rep. Brett Guthrie
tweet_text: Title 42 is a strong deterrent to illegal immigration across the Southern Border. More than half of the encounters in February at the Southwest border were processed for expulsion under Title 42.

name: Rep. Brett Guthrie
tweet_text: President Biden is again creating more opportunities for deadly drugs, like fentanyl, to flood our communities. On day 1, President Biden stopped construction of the border wall and now he wants to repeal Title 42 policy.

name: Rep. Brett Guthrie

Biden admin must get control of the border.

name: Rep. Brett Guthrie

tweet_text: One of the main driving factors in the increase in overdose deaths is fentanyl. More than 57,000 of these overdose deaths were from synthetic opioids, largely due to fentanyl. Compared to heroin, fentanyl is 50 times more potent.
